name: النحشة Run
description:
Are you looking for an addictive running game to sharpen your mind? Do you like the endless Arab runner games? Join the most intense chase through the streets of the city of Riyadh, Cairo, and soon Dubai with the simulation experience of Alnahsha Run, Endless Running Game. The perfect chase running game is ready for you now!

HIGH-QUALITY RUNNING GAME

Alnahsha Run is one of the absolute best runner games. It has full of adventures and offers you unique gameplay, Simple game controls, stunning graphics, and cool sound effects. Discover the huge world filled with challenging missions, various obstacles, and lots of quests and challenges for unlimited entertainment. Explore Riyadh, Cairo, and soon Dubai while you are escaping, refresh your brain, and immerse yourself in Arabian culture in this new endless runner game. You’re going to love it!

GREAT ALNAHSHA RUN STORYLINE

You’ve been mischief chilling out with mobile for fun. Your father gets furious and wants to teach you a lesson! Don’t get caught or you will be punished. Take the runner boy safely through the city, run as fast as possible, dodge the challenging obstacles, use the powerful boosters, jump up or slide down to escape your father, and Complete missions to earn coins and increase your multiplier. You won’t regret downloading this amazing Arab running game.

ALNAHSHA RUN ARCADE GAME

If you’re tired of all the boring classic street running games, and you’re in need of an exciting run escape game; Then Alnahsha Run is the perfect game for you! It has various features that will enhance your gaming experience, become the runner hero, show your running and jumping skills, get rewards by finishing each mission, unlock cool outfits, upgrade your boosts to gain a massive advantage, collect the item of the day to unlock daily rewards, and prepare yourself for a fantastic run race 3D game.


Why you have to download and install Alnahsha Run, Endless Running Game, on your iPhone or iPad?

It’s very easy to play so you need just to install on your device and use it instantly. The best thing is that you don't need to create an account before playing our game.

It offers stunning graphics, native control, and dynamic gameplay.

It’s free! so there are no hidden fees, no special memberships, and no annual subscription fees.

HOW TO PLAY:

1- Dodge, Roll, and Jump through the streets.

2- Avoid obstacles and escape from your father.

3- Use amazing boosts and collect coins.

4- Run as long as possible to increase your score.

Features:

- FREE & EASY TO PLAY!

- Simple swipe controls that are easy to use and hard to forget!

- Challenging quests & missions

- Upgradable boosts & Cool outfits

- Daily Rewards & Challenges

- Stunning graphics & beautiful animation effects

- A leaderboard to beat the scores of friends and millions of other players.

Let’s download Alnahsha Run, Endless Running Game, and enjoy this addictive rush game.

Note:

We are always striving to provide the best user experience for our players. We are also looking for your feedback, suggestion, or recommendation.
Please, feel free to email us and let us know from you so we can continue to bring you the best experiences and updates.
